entry.title: Responding in a Timely Manner
entry.content:
Excellent talk from REACTCONF 2014 by Martin Thompson in London (which I was lucky enough to attend earlier this year).

In this talk Martin defines different levels of “Real Time”, touching on the importance of being responsive and practical tools and advice to achieve that in practice.

The talk is broken into the following sections:

  1. How to Test and Measure
  2. A little bit of Theory
  3. A little bit of Practice
  4. Common Pitfalls
  5. Useful Algorithms and Techniques

You can find the full conference playlist here…

Enjoy!
